layman_description: Basic wooden frame for building structure foundation.
technical_description: Early-game buildable block with low durability and fast construction.
player_impact: Starting material for quick base construction during initial survival.

layman_description: Stone block for defensive building.
technical_description: Early defensive block providing more durability than wood frames.
player_impact: First durability upgrade for permanent base structures.

layman_description: Reinforced concrete for strong bases.
technical_description: Mid-tier building material with high durability and compression strength.
player_impact: Primary defensive material for horde-proof structures.

layman_description: Steel reinforced block for maximum durability.
technical_description: Highest-tier building material with extreme damage resistance.
player_impact: End-game defensive block for impenetrable bases.

layman_description: Thin steel sheet for armor plating structures.
technical_description: Lightweight steel layer providing damage reduction per unit.
player_impact: Space-efficient high-protection option for small bases.

layman_description: Wooden hinged entrance for sneaky base access.
technical_description: Toggleable barrier providing concealed entry points.
player_impact: Secret passage creation for tactical respawn routes.

layman_description: Climbable structure for vertical base navigation.
technical_description: Walkable vertical traversal element enabling multi-story bases.
player_impact: Essential for building and accessing upper levels.

layman_description: Stepped walkway for easier climbing.
technical_description: Traversal block replacing ladders for accessibility.
player_impact: More convenient vertical movement than ladders.

layman_description: See-through window for viewing outside safely.
technical_description: Transparent block providing sight lines without damage reduction.
player_impact: Observation posts and safe perimeter visibility.

player_impact: Trap mechanism triggering for horde management.

layman_description: Iron prison-style door for secure containment.
